alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 1:34PM PST until February 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches above 5500`, except 7 to 18 inches west of US-395. Up to 3 inches is possible below 5500 feet. Southwest wind gusts of 30 to 45 mph, except up to 60 mph in wind prone areas. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Saturday to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause isolated power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a 10 to 15% chance for thunder in the Sierra during the day Sunday.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. Download Caltran`s Quickmap application on your smart phone or call 5 1 1 to get the latest roadway conditions in California.
